import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { dataFilter} from '../store/ProductSlice' import { addToCart } from '../store/ProductSlice' function Card({product=[],filterdata=[] ,users=[] ,login}) { const dispatch = useDispatch() const displayData = filterdata.length>0 ? filterdata : product; return ( <>

Latest Products


{displayData.length>0 ? (displayData.map((el, indx) => (

{el.title}

{el.description}

${el.price}

))):"Coming Soon :)"}
); } export default Card;
